1color-light.description: Single color (neutral) logo for light backgrounds
1color-light.guidance: Professional and clean - won't compete with colorful design elements

1color-dark.description: Single color (neutral) logo for dark backgrounds
1color-dark.guidance: Professional and clean - won't compete with colorful design elements

2color-light.description: Two color (neutral + green) logo for light backgrounds
2color-light.guidance: Most recognizable CIQ branding - use when logo is the star of the design

2color-dark.description: Two color (neutral + green) logo for dark backgrounds
2color-dark.guidance: Most recognizable CIQ branding - use when logo is the star of the design

green-light.description: Single color (green) logo for light backgrounds
green-light.guidance: Use in neutral/minimal designs when you need the logo to jump out

green-dark.description: Single color (green) logo for dark backgrounds
green-dark.guidance: Use in neutral/minimal designs when you need the logo to jump out

brand_guidelines.clear_space: Equal to 1/4 the height of the 'Q' in the logo

main_element.description: Logo is the hero/star of the design

supporting_element.alternative: green (for neutral designs where logo needs to pop)
